From : P&A Shipbrokers - Singapore ( Email: pna@pnaship.com)
Ref  : Tony 



MV SF DARIKA - 35,237 DWT / LOG-BC / BLT 2010 / 5HH - 4C30.5T  


- OPEN ITALY, INT. RAVENNA O/A 20/26 AUG 

** NOW FOCUSING FAREAST / SE ASIA (TRY INDIA)

* NO BLACKSEA / LEBANON *

- EEXI COMPLIANT 
- VSL HOLDS ARE GRAIN CLEAN
- FULLY FTTED LOGGER
- CAN DO STEEL COILS 15 T COIL / 3 TIERS AND 20 T COIL / 2 TIERS
- CO2 FITTED
- A60 STEEL BULKHEAD
- PREFER VOAYGE/ CAN TRY 1 TCT 
- ANY DIRECTION 
- EBOD VLSFO / LSMGO - ABOUT - 600 MT / 30 MT


MV SF DARIKA (EX TASMAN SPIRIT)

TYPE:SDBC,LOGGER WITH ENGINE/BRIDGE AFT 
CLASSIFICATION: KR
IMO NUMBER: 9502752 CALL SIGN: V7A4814
FLAG: THAI
TYPE: BULK CARRIER, LOGGER WITH ENGINE/BRIDGE AFT 
BUILT: NANTONG CHANGQINGSHA SHIPYARD, CHINA, 2010 
GROSS TONNAGE: 22,402
NET TONNAGE: 12,019
VESSEL DIMENSIONS: 
L.O.A.: 179.90 M
L.B.P.: 171.50 M
BEAM: 28.44 M
DEPTH MOULDED: 15.0 M 

DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT: 
SUMMER: 35237.0 MTS ON 10.816 METERS 
WINTER: 34193.9 MTS ON 10.591 METERS 
TROPICAL: 36286.3 MTS ON 11.041 METERS
TIMBER SUMER: 34309.7 MTS ON 10.616 METERS
TPC AT SUMMER: 46.5; TPC AT WINTER: 46.3

HOLDS / HATCHES: 5 HOLDS / 5 HATCHES

CAPACITY AND DIMENSIONS: 
CARGO HOLDS CAPACITY IN CBM:
HOLD NO. GRAIN CBM BALE CBM
NO.1 HOLD 6,910.70 6,598.13
NO.2 HOLD 10,018.30 9,665.95
NO.3 HOLD 9,375.40 9,045.69
NO.4 HOLD 10,018.30 9,665.95
NO.5 HOLD 7,971.60 7,611.12 
TOTAL: 44,294.30 42,586.84

CARGO HOLD DEMENTION (TANKTOP MEASUREMENT)
HOLD NO. DIMENTION L x B (F/A) x H HATCH SIZE 
NO.1 HOLD 26.4 x 4.80/24.6 x 13.35 14.4 x 17.6 
NO.2 HOLD 28.8 x 24.6/24.6 x 13.35 20.0 x 19.2 
NO.3 HOLD 28.8 x 24.6/24.6 x 13.35 20.0 x 19.2 
NO.4 HOLD 28.8 x 24.6/24.6 x 13.35 20.0 x 19.2 
NO.5 HOLD 25.6 x 24.6/11.2 x 13.35 18.4 x 19.2 

TYPE OF OPENING HATCH: MACGREGOR, HYDRAULIC FOLDING HATCH COVER
PERMISSIBLE LOADS (TON PER SQ.METER): 
ON TANK TOPS: 1/20.0; 2/20.0; 3/20.0; 4/20.0; 5/20.0
ON HATCH COVERS: 3.0 TON/M2; UPPER DECK: 4.0 TON/M2

CO2 FITTED, FULLY LOGS FITTED, AUSTRALIAN LADDER FITTED

CRANES TYPE AND CAPACITY: 
4 WUHAN IHI CRANES / SWL=30.5 MT
MAX OUTREACH FROM C/L 24 M 
MAX OUTREACH FROM SHIP?S SIDE 9.6 M
NO. 1 CRANE - BETWEEN HOLDS NOS. 1 AND 2
NO. 2 CRANE - BETWEEN HOLDS NOS. 2 AND 3
NO. 3 CRANE - BETWEEN HOLDS NOS. 3 AND 4
NO. 4 CRANE - BETWEEN HOLDS NOS. 4 AND 5
HEIGHT OF LOG STANCHIONS: AT HOLD 1: 7.5M; HOLDS 2-5: 8.5 M

VESSEL FULL TANK CAPACITY (NOT ALL PUMPABLE): 
FUEL OIL TANK: 1,463.4 CBM 
DIESEL OIL TANK: 167.7 CBM
FRESH WATER TANK: 309.5 CBM 
UNPUMPABLE BALLAST WATER: ABT 100MT WOG
CONSTANT: ABT 350 MTS WOG

SPEED / CONSUMPTION: BASIS SUMMER DRAFT, UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS ON UNRESTRICTED PASSAGE NOT EXCEEDING BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3.

AT SEA CONSUMPTION FULL SPEED: 
BALLAST ABOUT 13.5 KNOTS ON ABT 18.9 MTS VLSFO + 1.74 MT LSMGO 
LADEN ABOUT 13.25 KNOTS ON ABT 20 MTS VLSFO + 1.74 MT LSMGO

AT SEA CONSUMPTION ECO: 
BALLAST ABOUT 12 KNOTS ON ABT 14.5 MTS VLSFO + 1.74 MT LSMGO 
LADEN ABOUT 12 KNOTS ON ABOUT 16.3 MTS VLSFO + 1.74 MT LSMGO 

IN PORT CONSUMPTION: 
AT PORT MOORING OR LOADING OR DISCHARING BASIS TWO A/E + BOILER: 
AT PORT WORKING, 1.5 MT VLSFO + 3.0 MT LSMGO 
IDLE, ONE A/E + BOILER: 1 MT VLSFO + 1.5 MT LSMGO

SULPHUR CONTENT - VLSFO, ISO 8217/2017, LSMGO (DMA) MAX 0.1 PCT SULPHUR CONTENT ISO 8217/2017

ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND GIVEN IN GOOD FAITH ANY SAVING IN CONSUMPTION MUST BE OFF-SET AGAINST ANY SPEED UNDERPERFORMANCE, ANY SAVING IN TIME MUST BE OFF-SET AGAINST ANY EXCESS CONSUMPTION, ANY SAVING IN FO MUST BE OFF-SET AGAINST INCREASED MDO AND VICE VERSA, AND ANY OVERALL SAVING ON INDIVIDUAL PASSAGE(S) MUST BE SET OFF AGAINST AN OVERALL LOSS ON OTHER INDIVIDUAL PASSAGE(S). 
SPEED/CONSUMPTION FIGURES BASIS SUMMER DRAFT, UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS ON UNRESTRICTED PASSAGE NOT EXCEEDING BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 

IT IS EXPLICITY UNDERSTOOD AND AGREED THAT NO WARRANTY APPLIES WHILST SAILING IN RESTRICTED AREAS A/O I/O PORTS/CANALS/RIVERS, MANOEUVERING, PILOT TO PILOT, SAILING IN BAD WEATHER AND/OR IN NARROW/SHALLOW WATERS WHEN THE VESSEL MAY CONSUMES MDO IN MAIN ENGINE. CONSUMPTION MAY INCREASE DURING BALLASTING/DEBALLASTING/BALLAST EXCHANGE OPERATION AT PORT/SEA. 
'ABOUT' ON SPEED MEANS 0.5 KNOT ALLOWANCE AND 'ABOUT' ON BUNKERS CONSUMPTION MEANS 5% ALLOWANCE ON THE DESCRIBED DAILY BUNKER CONSUMPTION.

SPEED/CONSUMPTION UNDERPERFORMANCE CLAIM CAN ONLY BE SUBMITTED IN RESPECT OF PERIODS DURING WHICH THE VESSEL ENCOUNTERS WEATHER UPTO BEAUFORT 4 AND/OR DOUGLAS SEASTATE 3 (SIGNIFICANT WAVE UP TO 1.25 M MAX) AND/OR NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND/OR NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL WITH A MINIMUM STEAMING OF ATLEAST 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS.

VESSEL'S CRANES NOT TO BE OPERATED BY CREW BUT INSTEAD TO BE OPERATED BY QUALIFIED AND PROPERLY CERTIFIED SHORE PERSONNEL EMPLOYED AND PAID FOR BY CHARTERERS AND CRANE OPERATION ALWAYS AT CHARTERERS ENTIRE RISK, RESPONSIBILITY AND EXPENSE WHO ARE TO FOLLOW OPERATING INSTRUCTIONS STRICTLY AS PER MANUFACTURERS OPERATING MANUALS.

CHARTERERS TO HAVE THE OPTION TO HAVE THE VESSEL RUN ON ECO SPEED AND CONSUMPTION AS DESCRIBED BY OWNERS. WHEN CHARTERERS ORDER THE VESSEL TORUN ON ECO SPEED, THIS SHALL CONSTITUTE COMPLIANCE WITH, AND THERE SHALL BE NO BREACH OF, ANY OBLIGATION REQUIRING THE VESSEL TO PROCEED WITH UTMOSTAND/OR DUE DESPATCH OR ANY OTHER SUCH SIMILAR/EQUIVALENT EXPRESSION. VESSEL/OWNERS ARE NOT TO BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY CLAIMS RELATED TO VESSELS SPEED AND/OR BUNKER CONSUMPTION DURING ANY PERIODS WHERE THE VESSEL HAS BEEN REQUESTED TO PROCEED AT ECO SPEED.

ALL DETAILS ABOUT

REGARDS,

RGDS / TONY
